headline: Dexcom Launches Revolutionary AI-Powered Meal Logging Feature Across Glucose Biosensing Portfolio
summary: SAN DIEGO, July 28, 2025--DexCom, Inc., the global leader in glucose biosensing, announced today it has released a new AI-powered photo meal logging feature to Stelo, the first over-the-counter glucose biosensor cleared1 by the FDA in the United States, following the feature’s launch on Dexcom G7 earlier this year.

content.title: Dexcom Launches Revolutionary AI-Powered Meal Logging Feature Across Glucose Biosensing Portfolio
content.summary: SAN DIEGO, July 28, 2025--DexCom, Inc., the global leader in glucose biosensing, announced today it has released a new AI-powered photo meal logging feature to Stelo, the first over-the-counter glucose biosensor cleared1 by the FDA in the United States, following the feature’s launch on Dexcom G7 earlier this year.

thumbnail.caption: Users can now take a photo of their food in their Stelo or Dexcom G7 app where AI will automatically identify the ingredients and populate the meal description.
